No luck there. 

Thanks

The screenshot and the stacktrace in here are not releated.
David, try to download a new vm and copy it to the eclipse dir, the launcher 
should found it automatically.

Paul, I can't reproduce this problem, can you provide more details about your 
system: desktop, theme, gtk version, how often the probem happens, if the 
problem happens starting eclipse with an empty workspace, etc.

Thanks

Answering requests for additional information:

The problem happens when trying to simply run eclipse for the first time.  No opportuinties for 
creating or opening workspaces, dialogs, etc.  It happens every time.

The machine is RedHat 9.0, started with a minimal installation, then the minimum necessary 
packages from RedHat installed to have GTK present, and patched as of Sep 2, 2003.  Some of the 
RedHat errate updates to this point do update X and/or GTK.  No local X server is running.  The 
server is OS-X running Apple version of XFree-86, but this also happens using Hummingbird 
Exceed on Windows as the client, so it's unlikely to be specific to an X server.  I have not tried a 
local X server, mostly because the machine doesn't really have the hardware or access to do it.
apologies: "Exceed on Windows as the client" should read "Exceed on Windows as the _server_".

I have this same problem, and I have tried using 3.0M3 as well.  I have also
triedd the motif version and get the same problem
Paul: does the motif version work for you ?

Just wanted to report that I'm also having this issue, with both M4 and 2.1.2, running on SuSE 8.2. 
Like Paul, I'm getting the crash on startup, before anything comes up. I'm doing the same thing - 
the SuSE box was a fairly minimal install, to which I've added libraries for gtk2, and I'm ssh'ing into 
it and opening windows up back on my Mac desktop. I've run swing based apps which had no 
problems, so maybe X windows is OK. 

More on my setup -
SuSE 8.2, gtk2 2.2.1, XFree86 4.3.0, no desktop, I think it's called quartz wm (the default wm for 
X11 on Mac OS X 1.3.1). Java(TM) 2 Runtime Environment, Standard Edition (build 1.4.1_02-b06) 
on the SuSE box.

(for example CTabFolder doesn't scale images anymore).

include new stacktrace.
